title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: Further travel to the east is cut off by a large mountain.  The cliff provides some cover from the wind and snow, although not enough for you to feel secure from the cold.  Two ice totems stand facing the mountain, sentinels against some unknown threat.
Further travel to the east is cut off by a large mountain.  It provides some cover from the wind and snow.  Two ice totems stand facing the mountain.
